SG party bus service is superb! It took our night out to the next level. Non-stop fun and the experience was superb! Van was clean, speakers, running lights and microphones. Everything you need for a nice party experience en route to your destination. Will definitely recommend!

Booked 3 vehicles with Prestige Transportation. 110% highly recommended. Driver was super accommodative and has very wide knowledge on all party areas in Singapore. All my friends and I had a very fun time with Prestige. Thanks Prestige Transportation for the service rendered.
Very nice driver, fun costumes to use, amazing sound quality and lights were very cool. super spacious bus, easy to dance. very kind driver. 10/10 expericnce

Best Party Bus Service In Singapore !
Great experience in Singapore. Thank you SG - Party Bus.
